name: Buddy
description: Buddy is a friendly and energetic dog. He loves to play fetch and go on long walks. He is great with children and other pets.

name: Whiskers
description: Whiskers is a playful and curious cat. She gets along well with other cats.

name: Hopper
description: Hopper is a sweet and gentle rabbit. He loves nibbling on fresh vegetables.

name: Sunny
description: Sunny is a colorful parrot with a vibrant personality. A playful companion for any bird lover.

name: Nemo
description: Nemo is a beautiful tropical fish with vibrant colors.He adds splash of color to any fish tank.

description: Mittens is an adorable guinea pig with a soft coat. A perfect small pet for any home.
